name: Sphinx: Half-Cat/Half-Man
description:
-For Mini Jam 61: Ancient Egypt-

There are two conflicting sides to the Sphinx; The ManHalf loves riddles, the CatHalf loves knocking things off desks. Help ManHalf and CatHalf solve riddles the only way they know how! Can you reconcile riddles and physics, 2D and 3D, modern and ancient?
